greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows, where row (n) = n mod n, n mod (n-1), n mod (n-2), ...n mod 1.
comment: Also, rectangular array read by antidiagonals, a(n, k) = k mod n (k >= 0, n >= 1). Cf. A048158, A051127. - _David Wasserman_, Oct 01 2008
Central terms: a(2*n - 1, n) = n - 1. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 25 2011
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Rows n=1..150 of triangle, flattened
xref: Cf. A051778. Row sums give A004125. Number of 0's in row n gives A000005 (tau(n)). Number of 1's in row n+1 gives A032741(n).
results.author: Asher Auel (asher.auel(AT)reed.edu), Dec 09 1999
